verses.roman:
ei śloka paḍi' duṅhāre kailā āliṅgana
kṛpāte duṅhāra māthāya dharilā caraṇa

synonyms: ei śloka—this verse; paḍi'-reciting; duṅhāre—the two brothers; kailā āliṅgana—embraced; kṛpāte—out of causeless mercy; duṅhāra—of both of them; māthāya—on the heads; dharilā—placed; caraṇa—His feet.
translation: After reciting this verse, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu embraced both brothers, and out of His causeless mercy He placed His feet on their heads.
